casebody.data:
STRAITE
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY 407P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Sheldon Straite, for Straite, Sheldon. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC Department of Public Safety.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
